description: Smallest k such that k(p-1)-1 is positive and divisible by p where p = n-th prime.
comments: Also smallest positive k such that the k-th triangular number is divisible by the n-th prime. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 19 2002
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
